results.name: Decimal expansion of 2/Pi^2.
comment: Asymptotic density of the even squarefree numbers (A039956). - _Amiram Eldar_, May 22 2020
reference: C. F. Gauss, Disquisitiones Arithmeticae, Yale, 1965; see p. 360.
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..3000
formula: Equals -Sum_{k>=1} mu(2*k)/(2*k)^2, where mu is the Möbius function (A008683). - _Amiram Eldar_, Jul 31 2020
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Feb 19 2011
